title: Daily Metric
query: SELECT t AS time, (sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi())*50+50) AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: Current Score
query: SELECT avg(v) AS value FROM (SELECT (random()*100)::numeric AS v FROM generate_series(1,1000)) s

title: Top Categories
query: SELECT label, value FROM (VALUES ('Alpha', 42), ('Beta', 27), ('Gamma', 58)) AS x(label, value) ORDER BY value DESC

title: Category Bars
query: SELECT label, value FROM (VALUES ('North', 120), ('South', 95), ('East', 130), ('West', 80)) AS x(label, value)

title: Trend (ECharts)
query: SELECT t AS time, (50 + 30*sin(extract(epoch from t)/3600)) AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 hour') AS t
